definition: to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

sentences.english: As a social phenomenon, the evasion of law exists in the contemporary China objectively.
sentences.chinese: 法律規避作爲一個社會現象客觀地在當代中國存在着。

sentences.english: Domestic scholars have generally denied legality of anti circumvention.
sentences.chinese: 國內學者普遍對反規避措施的合法性持否定觀點。

sentences.english: The anti-circumvention clause has its' validity and rationality.
sentences.chinese: 反規避條款有其存在的合法性和合理性。

sentences.english: Germany and France have been leading an initiative to tackle tax-saving bank slowders.
sentences.chinese: 德國和法國提出計劃處理那些稅收規避銀行。

sentences.english: Law evasion is an illegal act.
sentences.chinese: 法律規避是一種違法行爲。

sentences.english: The concern in setting a limit is the genetic risk of consanguinity.
sentences.chinese: 設定精子使用率上限是用來規避近親繁殖的風險的。

sentences.english: How about building a portfolio that avoids niches, industries and sectors where global overcapacity will create a profitless recovery?
sentences.chinese: 弄一個投資組合，規避那些過剩的行業，如何？

sentences.english: Shadowbox to evade or avoid positive, direct or decisive action.
sentences.chinese: 規避或躲避採取正面或直接的行動或迴應等。

sentences.english: Its peculiar status has inclined it to fudge the argument.
sentences.chinese: 這一奇特的地位使它可以規避這些爭論。

sentences.english: The arms embargo, which applies equally to Gaddafi and the opposition, will have to be circumvented.
sentences.chinese: 對卡扎菲及其反對派的武器禁運必須要想辦法規避。

sentences.english: Option clauses shall not be used in a manner which circumvents the provisions of the Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 期權購買條款不得用來規避本協議的規定。

sentences.english: It's wrong of you to get around the regulation.
sentences.chinese: 你存心規避規章制度是不對的。

sentences.english: Hedge funds are structured to avoid direct regulation and taxation in major countries. N. F.
sentences.chinese: 對沖基金是規避國家相關政策和稅收而設。

sentences.english: A new tool will join the censorship circumvention arsenal this September.
sentences.chinese: 這個九月，又一個新工具加入審查規避軍火庫。

sentences.english: Father of avoid dunning, no sign of drag more female debt collection harassment.
sentences.chinese: 欣父規避追債沒了蹤跡，拖累欣母倍受討債騷擾。

sentences.english: That's coupon clipping and risk mitigation.
sentences.chinese: 這就是定期獲得收益和風險規避。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
